main event: A civilian reported a sighting of one round white object in the sky, larger than any star or planet, observed over Montgomery, Alabama for four hours.
interesting points: The object appeared to change shape and occasionally emitted points of reddish glowing light., All observations were similar to jet phenomena., The object disappeared from view and reappeared in the same location., The sighting lasted four hours and was observed using binoculars., The object moved from southeast to east during the observation.
sighted object: one round white object in the sky
